Package com.advertisementproject.campaignservice.service

Class CampaignServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.campaignservice.service.CampaignServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CampaignService
@Service
public class CampaignServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CampaignService
Service implementation for Campaign Service to manage campaigns

    • getDiscountCode

      public java.lang.String getDiscountCode​(java.util.UUID campaignId)
      Retrieves the discount code for a specific campaign
      Specified by:
      getDiscountCode in interface CampaignService
      Parameters:
      campaignId - the id of the campaign to get the discount code from
      Returns:
      the discount code for the campaign with the supplied campaign id
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the campaign is not found
      UnauthorizedAccessException - if the campaign is not published for the requested discount code

    • getCampaignAndAuthorize

      private Campaign getCampaignAndAuthorize​(java.util.UUID campaignId, java.util.UUID companyId)
      Helper method to retrieve a campaign and verify that the supplied company id matches the company id of the requested campaign.
      Parameters:
      campaignId - the id of the campaign to retrieve
      companyId - the company id to verify ownership
      Returns:
      the requested campaign
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the campaign is not found.
      UnauthorizedAccessException - if the supplied company id does not match the campaign's company id

    • updateCampaignFields

      private void updateCampaignFields​(Campaign campaign, CampaignRequest request)
      Helper method to update a campaign. Updates not null fields in the supplied request. Campaigns may be set to be published immediately or set to be published at a later time. The timestamp fields publishedAt and expiredAt are validated here, but the other fields must still be validated.
      Parameters:
      campaign - the campaign to update
      request - request object containing fields to update in the supplied campaign
